description: Chaosium Inc. has launched two new titles for role-playing game fans, “Pendragon Core Rulebook” and “The Grey Knight.” These releases promise to immerse players in the adventures and intrigues of King Arthur’s Britain, offering a blend of chivalric tales and strategic gameplay. The “Pendragon: Core Rulebook” encompasses the essential mechanics of the Pendragon game system,...
title: “Pendragon Core Rulebook and The Grey Knight” Released – A New Adventure in Arthurian Legend Awaits!

description: Osprey Games recently revealed an expansion to their Stargrave series, introducing “Dead or Alive,” a supplement designed by Joseph A. McCullough. This new release focuses on solo bounty hunting in the game’s universe, where players command a crew to track down fugitives. “Dead or Alive” enables players to engage in various missions with motives ranging...
title: Osprey Games Announces Release of New “Stargrave: Dead or Alive” Supplement

description: Fantasy Flight Games has announced the re-release of “The Innsmouth Conspiracy,” now separated into two expansions: The Innsmouth Conspiracy Investigator Expansion and The Innsmouth Conspiracy Campaign Expansion. This update provides an entry point for new players and a completion opportunity for veteran collectors of Arkham Horror: The Card Game. Set in the fictional town of...
title: Fantasy Flight Games Announces Repackaged ‘The Innsmouth Conspiracy’ Expansions for Arkham Horror LCG
